txt.en: Caddabrand places value in animal-hides that can be sold to merchants and traders. Fine wolf-pelts should fetch a fair price and would likely be exactly the sort of thing that Caddabrand would offer a reward for.

Caddabrand places value in animal-hides that can be sold to merchants and traders. Fine wolf-pelts should fetch a fair price and would likely be exactly the sort of thing that Caddabrand would offer a reward for.
Norcrofts pack-wolves reside in and around Âmbal's den, west of Caddabrand's camp.\n\nCollecting the fine hides of pack-wolves is sure to be rewarded by the opportunistic Caddabrand.

'These pack-wolf pelts should fetch a fine price at market. You are quickly proving to be more capable than you at first appear to be! \n\n'I certainly could have gathered these pelts myself, had I not more important tasks at hand. Yet I do feel this warrants a suitable reward. Fine thinking, on your part.'
Norcrofts pack-wolves reside in and around Âmbal's den, west of Caddabrand's camp.\n\nCollecting the fine hides of pack-wolves is sure to be rewarded by the opportunistic Caddabrand.
Caddabrand's camp lies east of Âmbal's den, a ways south of the river-crossing.\n\nCaddabrand should be pleased to see the initiative you have taken in collecting him these tradeable wolf-hides.
